Docs.summary: Defines the metadata attribute that task authors use to identify required task properties. Task properties with this attribute must have a set value when the task is run.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If a property marked with this attribute is not assigned a value when the task is invoked, the build will fail.
For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## Examples The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories.
[!code-cs[msbuild_MakeDirTask#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/msbuild_MakeDirTask/msbuild_MakeDirTask.cs#1)]
To run this task use a project file like this:
``` <Project xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/developer/msbuild/2003"> <Target Name="MyTarget"> <MkDir Directories="NewDir" /> </Target> </Project> ```
